name: Ohana Island
description:
Live the dream on a beautiful island!

"Ohana Island" is a tap-to-blast puzzle game set in an enchanting tropical landscape! Design and decorate your flower shop, befriend the locals, and uncover the hidden mysteries of the island!

Start living the dream as a green thumb florist on Ohana Island!

Game Features:
・Challenging levels - 300+ tap-to-match puzzles - will make the island blossom!
・Unlockable skins - Turn your flower shop from drab to fab!
・Uncover the mystery - Reveal the secrets of Ohana Island through rich and exciting storylines.
・Make friends on the island - Enjoy the companionship of a truly wild cast, from the kooky yet grandmotherly Lily Maka, to the vegan villain Lucas Sweet, to the totally tubular Kiko Kilani.
・Weekly events - Bringing new challenges to spice up your adventure!
・Play offline - Don't risk being bored the next time you can't access the Internet!

Note:
The game is free to play, but you may purchase many of the game's elements, if you so choose.

Love playing Ohana Island?
Meet us and stay up-to-date on the latest news through our websites and user community!
https://www.facebook.com/OhanaIsland/

We'd be happy to answer any of your questions or hear suggestions. Feel free to email us at Contact info:
